title: List of all Android autocomplete  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android autocomplete  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: autocompleteview
repoList.description: An easy AutocompleteView library for Android

repoList.name: Google-Places-AutoComplete-EditText
repoList.description: A simple library that can connect your autocomplete edittext to Google places api

repoList.name: Smarty-Streets-AutoCompleteTextView
repoList.description: Gradle library. Android AutocompleteTextView that receives and displays address suggestions from Smarty Streets.

repoList.name: AutocompleteLocation
repoList.description: Cute library to implement PlaceAutocomplete based in autocomplete service in the Google Places API for Android.

repoList.name: AutocompleteLocationAndroid
repoList.description: Cute library to implement PlaceAutocomplete in android based in jotaramirez90 AutocompleteLocation library.

repoList.name: CodeEditor
repoList.description: Code Editor Native Way

repoList.name: SmartMaterialSpinner
repoList.description: The powerful android spinner library for your application

repoList.name: CodeEditor
repoList.description: A wonderful code editor library on Android with syntax-highlighting and auto-completion.

repoList.name: android-dynamic-autocomplete
repoList.description: A simple library that helps extends AutoCompleteTextView with dynamically loaded data

repoList.name: EasyLocationPicker
repoList.description: EasyLocationPicker is a library that allows you to pick user location easily on a map, It has geocoder and places autocomplete integrated
